name: NSScrollView.FindBarPosition
desc: These constants define the position of the find bar in relation to the scroll view.

items.name: case aboveHorizontalRuler
items.desc: The find bar is displayed above the horizontal ruler, if visible.

items.name: case aboveContent
items.desc: The find bar is displayed above the scroll view content.

items.name: case belowContent
items.desc: The find bar is displayed below the scroll view content.
